mapper.sql: id, version, created_date, last_modified_date, orders, is_enabled, is_required, name, options, pattern, property_index, type
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member_attribute WHERE property_index = #{index}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_attribute( id , created_date , version , orders , is_enabled , is_required , name , pattern , property_index , type , options ) VALUES ( #{entity.id}, #{entity.createdDate}, #{entity.version}, #{entity.order}, #{entity.isEnabled}, #{entity.isRequired}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.pattern}, #{entity.propertyIndex}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.options, typeHandler=net.shopec.handlers.MyListTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE member_attribute SET last_modified_date = #{entity.lastModifiedDate}, version = #{entity.version} + 1, orders = #{entity.order}, is_enabled = #{entity.isEnabled}, is_required = #{entity.isRequired}, name = #{entity.name}, pattern = #{entity.pattern}, options = #{entity.options, typeHandler=net.shopec.handlers.MyListTypeHandler} WHERE `id` = #{entity.id} AND version = #{entity.version}
